description: Department of National Defence has a  requirement for destruction (disabling) and disposal of small arms ammunition that is obsolescent or has serviceability issues and is no longer fit for use. \\nQuantity of commodity: 12,000kg in initial 1 year period \\n6,000kg in each option period\
duration_in_months: If the contract is extended, the contract will last for 6, 12, 18, or 24 months depending on when the notice period ends.
